events.name: Openaire Float In Cinema in Paddington
events.description: At Openaire Float-In Cinema, movies are shown on a six-by-three-metre LED screen at Merchant Square in Paddington Basin.

events.name: The Big London Bake
events.description: Challenge your friends at London's multi award winning bake off! All the ingredients are good to go, a top baker at your side, an irresistible monthly baking theme, an unforgettable experience and one winner.

events.name: Georgian London Walk
events.description: On this guided walk we take you back to the days when the surrounding area had a raucous reputation and see how it transformed from a place to be avoided at all costs to a most desirable postcode. We explore Georgian North Clerkenwell discovering tales of radicals and clowns, we will see see great Georgian engineering feats from engineering to town planning, in an area where Georgians came to play and be entertained.

events.name: Jam Concert Live
events.address: 70 W 115th St New York, New York(NY), 10026
events.description: The most diverse dj on the east coast, DJ RNB team up once again to bring you the next installment in the high energy, Jam Concert Live series!

events.name: UnMute Rock Festival
events.address: 55 La Salle St #12K New York, New York(NY), 10027
events.performers: Big Wednesday, Black Pyre, Calling Apollo
events.description: With bands from around the UK ready to send the roof into orbit, get ready for the loudest Welsh festival: the inaugural UnMute 2021.

events.name: Soul Kitchen Party
events.address: 60 Gramercy Park N #2 New York, London, 10010
events.performers: A-Trak, Nightmares on Wax, Rakim, Jay Electronica
events.description: Dope party which features Hip Hop legends, emerging artists and world-class turntablists
